sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The gnome-keyring package contains libgnome-keyring libraries and gnome-keyring-daemon.

sect3.title: gnome-keyring libraries
sect3.para: gnome-keyring libraries let other applications utilize the gnome-keyring-daemon.

sect3.title: gnome-keyring-daemon
sect3.para: gnome-keyring-daemon is a session daemon that keeps passwords for users.
